about_the_game:
Add more content & variety into your VRParadise Stripclub!


  • A new stripper with three identities to add to your club ( Diamond, Allison and Zoe) and to customize.
  • 6 new outfits specific to these identities.

content_descriptors.notes:
VR Paradise is a virtual striptease club that offers 3 types of sexual content:

- Pole-dances on stage with topless dancers.
- Table dances with close-up topless dancers.
- Performances in a private room during which the dancers undress completely (frontal depiction of the female genitals).

detailed_description:
Add more content & variety into your VRParadise Stripclub!


  • A new stripper with three identities to add to your club ( Diamond, Allison and Zoe) and to customize.
  • 6 new outfits specific to these identities.
legal_notice: VR Paradise uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2019, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
name: VR Paradise - Strippers Pack : Diamond, Alisson and Zoe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7–7700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
